level.text: 213.1 The designated beneficiary of a deceased employee shall be eligible toeceive unpaid compensation and a refund of the employee’s contribution to themployees’ Retirement Plan if the employee is not vested in accordance withhe provisions of the Retirement Plan.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 46 DCR 6236, 6242 (July 30, 1999); asmended by Final Rulemaking published at 59 DCR 8191, 8198 (July 6, 2012).
